pageContext.claim: “They want unfettered Catch and Release. We have ended that program....we have ended Catch and Release permanently.”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration has come up with several ideas to avoid releasing asylum seekers into the United States while they await immigration court hearings (what’s known as “catch and release”). But some of these pilot programs have been tied up in litigation, and authorities continue to release people into the country despite the president’s claim.
